name: EMET/H
description:
EMET/H is a student project, developped by 3rd year students in Unity.

Play as Emet, a mechanical lifeform with the power to possess their ennemies.

Let your blade guide you through this Tactical's prototype !

Commands :

: Cursor Controller

 : Camera Controller

: Sword's attack

: Possession Ability

: Move

: Cancel
